name: Moxel
description:
This is just a developer demo of Moxel, a 3D Rogue-Lite. Not the official release. Feedback is welcome and very much appreciated!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left mouse button - attack

Right mouse button - block

Shift - dash

E - Action/Pickup

Q - Use item

123 or Scrollwheel - switch items/weapons
